sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-cascader
    v-model="selectValue"
    :disabled="isDisabled"
    :options="options"
    :placeholder="$t('i18nView.selectPlaceholder')"
    :props="settings"
    :show-all-levels="showAllLevels"
    class="filter-item"
    clearable
    @change="doChange"></el-cascader>
</template>

<script>

import {mapGetters} from 'vuex'

export default {
  name: 'Cascader',
  props: {
    showAllLevels: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false,
      default: false
    },
    codetype: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    is_multiple: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false,
      default: false
    },
    filter: {
      type: String,
      required: false
    },
    disabled: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false
    },
    value: {
      type: Array
    },
    disabledCodeArray_first: {
      type: Array,
      required: false,
      default: () => {
        return []
      }
    },
    disabledCodeArray_second: {
      type: Array,
      required: false,
      default: () => {
        return []
      }
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    let firstOptions = this.ldcodes[this.codetype]
    this.buildCasCaderOptions(firstOptions)
    if (this.is_multiple) {
      this.settings = {'multiple': true}
    }
    this.selectValue = this.value
    if (this.disabled) {
      this.isDisabled = this.disabled
    }
  },
  methods: {
    doChange(val) {
      this.$emit('change', val)
    },
    buildCasCaderOptions(firstOptions) {
      let secondKeyArray_disabled = []
      for (const item of this.disabledCodeArray_second) {
        if (item.split('-').length < 2) {
          continue
        }
        let firstDataDisabledKey = this.codetype + '.' + item.split('-')[0] + '.' + item.split('-')[1]
        if (!this._.includes(secondKeyArray_disabled, firstDataDisabledKey)) {
          secondKeyArray_disabled.push(firstDataDisabledKey)
        }
      }
      for (let i = 0; i < firstOptions.length; i++) {
        let firstData = firstOptions[i]
        let firstLevel = {
          'value': firstData.code,
          'label': firstData.code + ':' + firstData.codename,
          'children': [],
          'disabled': this._.includes(this.disabledCodeArray_first, firstData.code)
        }
        let secondKey = this.codetype + '.' + firstData.code
        let secondOptions = this.ldcodes[secondKey]
        for (let j = 0; j < secondOptions.length; j++) {
          let secondData = secondOptions[j]
          let secondLevel = {
            'value': secondData.code,
            'label': secondData.code + ":" + secondData.codename,
            'disabled': this._.includes(secondKeyArray_disabled, secondKey + '.' + secondData.code)
          }
          firstLevel.children.push(secondLevel)
        }
        this.options.push(firstLevel)
      }
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      options: [],
      selectValue: [],
      settings: {},
      isDisabled: false
    }
  },
  watch: {
    value(val, oldVal) {
      this.selectValue = val
    },
    selectValue(val, oldVal) {
      if (val != oldVal) {
        this.$emit('input', this.selectValue)
      }
    },
    disabled(val, oldVal) {
      if (val != oldVal) {
        this.isDisabled = val
      }
    },
    filter(val, oldVal) {
      if (val != oldVal) {
        this.selectValue = ''
        this.options = this.ldcodes[this.codetype]
        let filterOptions = this.filterOptions(val, this.options)
        this.buildCasCaderOptions(filterOptions)
      }
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters([
      'ldcodes'
    ])
  }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
